activities: At Learningbridge, we collect name, gender and email addresses strictly for the use of running surveys. We send invitations and reminders to take a survey that users are invited to. Users are notified of the collection of their email address and can choose not to retain their email address on our site by contacting us. They are given password to update their info if needed. LB does not sell or distribute your info to any individuals. We do not send out advertisement. More details of our privacy policy can be found on our LearningBridge website.
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, France, Germany, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: LB has an in-house self-assessment program.
personaldata: The on-line data processed by LB is covered by the Safe Harbor.
